title: Re
content:
Meh.. It's just that your computer is too fast for the game. I know - I own that game myself. Try to run it on a good system config and most likely you will fail. Give it a go like this:

Set screen resolution and ALL graphics options to the Maximum available
Also, try to cut back on system performance by, for example, modifying the game's CPU priority to low and running about 10-15 Microsoft Words in the background (or, a Keen game made in Multimedia Fusion or The Games Factory, because these apps use 90-99% of processor speed)

Also, play around with switching subtitles on-off and using -or not using- DirectShow.
